item.title: Hack the Box: Admirer
item.description: Target IP: 10.10.10.187 Recon Scan Scan all ports, get version numbers. # Nmap 7.80 scan initiated as: nmap -A -p- 10.10.10.187 Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.187 Host is up (0.065s latency). Not shown: 65532 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 3.0.3 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.4p1 Debian 10+deb9u7 (protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 2048 4a:71:e9:21:63:69:9d:cb:dd:84:02:1a:23:97:e1:b9 (RSA) | 256 c5:95:b6:21:4d:46:a4:25:55:7a:87:3e:19:a8:e7:02 (ECDSA) |_ 256 d0:2d:dd:d0:5c:42:f8:7b:31:5a:be:57:c4:a9:a7:56 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.
